divs: Sighting DetailsA black disk with lights and windows came down out of the clouds and hoverd. Then came towards us with a beam of light scanning the water. But there was a lot more to this story.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Milford
There were no other sightings in Milford on or around November 1st 1991
Summary: First it was invisable but heard a sonic boom. Then we saw the black disk come down from the clouds and come towards us with a beam of light scanning the water.
